description: A cold and refreshing herb infused green tea.
keywords: Tea & iced tea,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Sesame free,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Lemon & Basil Ice Tea Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a large saucepan with the water.
Add the teabags and sugar and allow to simmer until the sugar melts.
Remove from the heat and add the chopped lemon and the basil leaves.
Transfer to a large jug and store in the fridge overnight.
Next day, sieve the iced tea from the jug into your serving glass with ice.
